mapper.insert: insert into sku_stock (goods_id, total_count, stock_count, create_time, update_time) values (#{goodsId}, #{totalCount}, #{stockCount}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update sku_stock set total_count = total_count + #{count}, stock_count = stock_count + #{count}, update_time = now() where goods_id = #{goodsId}
